content.body:
> <@akirose:matrix.org> In case I buried the lede: **the notes are formatted and ready to go** to Ecma. I'm holding them back for a few more days on the hopes more people want to and are able to add conclusions and/or summaries. if you DO add them, **let me know** so I can go fetch them and update the formatted documents. i will not notice any changes on my own.

I am going to work on writing these tomorrow. I’ll do them as suggest edits so they are easy to see, and point them to you afterwards. Generally I thought, if I get to this too late, I could fix these things up with a PR to the notes repository after the main PR is out. (I guess I don’t care as much if Ecma’s archive is incomplete as long as the committee’s notes are good). Are you working on the PR to the notes repo?
